      • getCommandlist

        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the loaded Command Objects

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand(Command command)
        Parameters:
        command - A Command Object Allows the user to add a command to the master command list

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand(java.lang.String commandLine)
        Iterates through the list of Command Objects. If a Command Object matching the command line is found, the arguments will be passed and the command invoked. If a file is found, its validity will be checked.
        Parameters:
        commandLine - A String of the entire command to be executed

      • setConsoleOutput

        public void setConsoleOutput(java.io.PrintStream consoleOutputStream)
        Sets the output of the console so it can be incorporated into graphical and file based applications;
        Parameters:
        consoleOutputStream - PrintStream, the PrintStream the console will print to.

        public void updateProperties()
